welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Rixensart, Belgium! A charming city known for its picturesque landscapes and rich cultural heritage. We invite you to explore and indulge in all that our beautiful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Brussels Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Brussels Airport, mainly used for low-cost airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Brussels Airport, primarily used for international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but it may require a login or registration.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Charleroi Brussels South Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for low-cost airlines and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
